summary: Provides an encoder‑decoder speech‑to‑text model that uses Connectionist Temporal Classification loss together with Byte‑Pair Encoding subword tokenization, and includes utilities for data loading, transcription, decoding strategy adjustment, vocabulary updates, and listing supported model variants.
business_intent: Help developers create and deploy flexible, high‑accuracy speech recognition solutions that leverage subword tokenization and configurable decoding without needing to manage low‑level model details.
